A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to '...'
2. Run command '....'
3. See error

## Expected Behavior

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

- OS: [e.g. Ubuntu 22.04, macOS 12, Windows 11]
- Python version: [e.g. 3.11]
- Java version: [e.g. 11]
- C++ compiler: [e.g. GCC 11, Clang 14, MSVC 2022]
- SIMILAR version/commit: [e.g. v1.0.0 or commit hash]

- [ ] Similar2Logo (Python DSL)
